remarks: Polynomial evaluation builder for the variable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
evl1var.q $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1var.v $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
evl1var.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1vard.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1vard.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
evl1vard.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1vard.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1vard $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. U /\ ( ( O ` X ) ` Y ) = Y ) ) $.
